statement: You are given a String[] text. Concatenate all the elements to make one string. A pair of non-empty two non-overlapping substrings of equal length (A, B) is called k-similar if there are no more than k positions where A and B have different characters. Return the number of distinct strings that belong to at least one such pair.

examples.note: The following strings each belong to at least one similar pair: "a", "b", "c", "d", "ab", "ac".

constraints.val: text will contain between 1 and 50 elements, inclusive.
Each element of text will contain between 1 and 50 characters, inclusive.
Each element of text will contain only lowercase letters ('a'..'z').
k will be between 0 and 2500, inclusive.
